title: ICT-Enabled Active Learning Program for Enhancing Elementary Science Critical Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific concepts and basic digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in a mobile learning environment using digital devices (tablets/smartphones), with a structure that enables formative assessment-based monitoring of the learning process

learning_goals: Students apply logical analysis skills while generating and verifying multiple hypotheses explaining scientific phenomena
Students construct scientific arguments incorporating peer feedback using digital collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet/Google Docs)
Students demonstrate critical decision-making skills in solving real-world scientific problems through problem-based learning (PBL) scenarios
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
